Description.Text: These stylish and modern apartments boast balconies and separate communal terraces with patio furniture on each floor. The Penthouse apartment takes the whole top floor of the building and has a private roof terrace. Salford Central Train Station is across the street from the property and Deansgate shopping district in Manchester city centre is a 10 min walk away. Also just a short walk away are MEN arena, Manchester Central Exhibition Centre and High Court of Justice. The financial district of Manchester with a large number of corporate head offices is also a 10 min walk away. Each apartment has a spacious living area, featuring a Samsung 40-inch TV, FREE wireless internet, fully fitted and equipped kitchen (including washing machine/dryer and dishwasher), two spacious bedrooms (master en-suite) and a luxury family bathroom. An added bonus for these apartments is secure off street parking. PLEASE NOTE: All guests must contact Dreamhouse prior to arrival to arrange their check in time.
Parking must be pre-booked with Dreamhouse office and is charged at a rate of 7 per day (subject to availability).

Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment - Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment with Double bed, lounge area, kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave, full size fridge/freezer, crockery and cutlery and a washer/dryer. Bathroom has a bath and shower. Apartment also features FREE wireless internet, Digital Freeview television, DVD player (on request), Iron and ironing board, hairdryer and a welcome pack. Parking is available on request, for a small charge, and must be booked prior to arrival. Your rate includes the housekeeping service and you will be provided with fresh towels and bed linen twice weekly.
Luxury 2 Bedroom Apartment - Luxury 2 Bedroom Apartment with 2 Double beds, lounge area, kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave, full size fridge/freezer, crockery and cutlery and a washer/dryer. Bathroom has a bath and shower. Apartment also features FREE wireless internet, Digital Freeview television, DVD player (on request), Iron and ironing board, hairdryer and a welcome pack. Parking is available on request, for a small charge, and must be booked prior to arrival. Your rate includes the housekeeping service and you will be provided with fresh towels and bed linen twice weekly.
Luxury 2 Bedroom Penthouse Apartment - Luxury 2 Bedroom Penthouse Apartment with 2 Double beds, large lounge area, kitchen with dishwasher, oven, microwave, full size fridge/freezer, crockery and cutlery and a washer/dryer. Main bathroom has a bath and shower and 1 bedroom has an ensuite. Apartment also features FREE wireless internet, Digital Freeview television, DVD player (on request), Iron and ironing board, hairdryer and a welcome pack. Parking is available on request, for a small charge, and must be booked prior to arrival. Your rate includes the housekeeping service and you will be provided with fresh towels and bed linen twice weekly.
